comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: I don't really know what you regard as legacy. If I were to say from my point of view, it would be that legacy has more to do with ones work and life which often results in wealth or poverty. For work I mean, what so passionately one loses him/herself in and in turn earn from it either it pays the soul and gives it fulfilment or it fills the pockets to sustainment and multiplication. Failure to leave a good legacy could be a result of mishap, inadequate planning, inability to discover oneself among other variables.Mine would aim to ensure my children learn what gives life meaning and how the pursuit of money ain't the path to happiness. Also, my wealth is theirs in all respect, both intellectually, financially, and otherwise.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: teosanru on January 07, 2023, 06:47:55 PMMost of the folks who are into Cryptos are around the age of 30s some even lower than that. I don't really think most of this generation has thought of giving their wealth to their offspring. This concept for them is pretty flawed. These days people want to make sure they live the best of their lives and their children should earn their livelihood and their fortune by themselves.Are people harsh like that on their future offsprings? Well, if I had children I would do the best to give them confort and life quality. And probably one of the reasons why I don't think about having children is because I know I can't offer them any of those things.I think it's an egoistical philosophy to want children to pass for the same difficulties they did, just because life wasn't easy for them, so children have to suffer as well.Once I settle my life, learn a profession, have an income for a confortable and independent life, then I could start thinking about children. Then I wouldn't have to worry in preparing a legacy for them anymore, because it would be already done. All I would have to do was to maintain it until they reached maturity age. If that will be possible someday, I hope it's going to be with the help of bitcoin.
